revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_ThrustLower'''
(''no parameter'')
Increments the floor clipping by 6 map units each call until it is fully underground. When buried, the first argument is set to 0 (lowered) and if the second argument (bloody) is non-zero will jump to the BloodThrustInit1 state, otherwise jumps to the ThrustInit1 state. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|ThrustFloor}} and derived classes.
